about_the_game:
This demo consists of the first two chapters of Scarlet Record saga and demonstrating its core mechanics i.e. combat system and story presentation.

The game is still in development--assets are still subject to changes and more contents will be added in near future.
We're open to suggestions; feel free to join our Discord server and let us know what's in your mind to improve the game even further.
